catList: This activity starts with the "project idea" created during Practice Development 2 (GSM 512) and terminates with a detailed "project proposal". Project proposal includes: the objective and scope of the project; methodology to be employed, delivarables and their time table, data collection and analysis, contributions expected (both to the company for and with which the project is being done and to the teams members in terms of learning and experience). This activity requires a close interaction between project team members, company representatives, and faculty project advisors.
